recipes.title: Best Pho Ever!
recipes.instructions: Throw the noodles into the water. Squeeze all the juice from the limes into the pot as well. Don't bother turning the stove on -- it is better served cold!
recipes.description: Trust me, this is what you're looking for.

recipes.title: Bacon Double Big Mac
recipes.instructions: Put everything in between the breads. Enjoy!
recipes.description: Are you working on your problem set at 3 AM and suddenly craving McDonald's? Are you tired and just wanna eat some junk food? Forget about DoorDash, this is the perfect recipe for you!

recipes.title: Sushi
recipes.instructions:
Peel the avocados, mash them all together in a bowl, and then wrap it all in 10 layers of seaweed.
Delicious!
recipes.description: This is the best sushi ever made! Perfect for vegetarians!

recipes.title: Cantonese-Style Ribs
recipes.instructions: Dump the soy sauce over the ribs and then cook on high heat for 3 hours.

recipes.title: Very Nice Fries!
recipes.instructions: Cut the potatoes into strips and then pour the salt over them. Potatoes are optional.
recipes.description: Are you hungry for some fries?
